definition: not show one's feeling or intentions
dew/syrup/nectar/outdoors (not under cover)/to show/to reveal/to betray/to expose

sentences.english: I noticed, behind the neutrality of his gaze, a deep weariness.
sentences.chinese: 我注意到他不露聲色的注視背後藏着深深的厭倦。

sentences.english: God knows, I have been a very indifferent lover.
sentences.chinese: 天知道，我是個不露聲色的情人。

sentences.english: In business a poker face can be very useful.
sentences.chinese: 在生意場上，不露聲色會非常有用的。

sentences.english: He knew where his brother was going, but he didn't let on.
sentences.chinese: 他知道他哥哥去哪裏了，但是他不露聲色。

sentences.english: Cowperwood had been quietly buying all of the small minority holdings.
sentences.chinese: 柯帕烏德在不露聲色地收買所有小戶的股票。

sentences.english: She knew there the children were hiding but she didn't let on.
sentences.chinese: 她知道孩子們藏在哪兒，但是不露聲色。

sentences.english: Hurstwood made great efforts to meet all expenditures without a show of feeling one way or the other.
sentences.chinese: 赫斯渥盡力支付一切費用，絲毫不露聲色。

sentences.english: Small parties were more or less "feel", but one's intentions.
sentences.chinese: 小方多少有了些“感覺”，只是不露聲色。
